TopicTitle: The 0.25 Waiting Room, now boarding passengers heading to Hypetown

Articles.Content: Guys I'm too hyped! I want to play .25 now! or atleast sooner then 1 week.

Uhoh.

The hype train....

Will it make it past minmus?

Uhoh.

The hype train....

Will it make it past minmus?

Already there:

The classified feature

YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll have to wait for this one a bit longer. If we had our way, we would tell no one about it and just let you guys discover it through gameplay with hilarious results.

Improved aerodynamics?! Too god to be true Maybe in .26

Improved aerodynamics?! Too god to be true Maybe in .26

Ha! Might be true

*1 hr later after playing 0.25*

Rage quit
Awake now, and back at the controls! Also, to whom it may concern, The HypeTrain does have brakes. It would be stupid to assume it doesn't! I just broke all the brakes.
Show me a hype train that can get into space and I'll buy my ticket today. Until then I'm leaving hype central station on my way to the hype plane hangar. But what I really want is a hype SPACESHIP!!

Improved aerodynamics?! Too god to be true Maybe in .26

It was said the secret feature is something a mod has never done, and FAR and NEAR do improved aerodynamics.

http://i61.tinypic.com/2ebxvdi.png

Those are not HypePlanes. Those are merely A-10 Warthogs With "HYPEPLANE DEFENSE/ATTACK" painted on them.

Those are not HypePlanes. Those are merely A-10 Warthogs With "HYPEPLANE DEFENSE/ATTACK" painted on them.

So you think they're overhyped, then?

It was said the secret feature is something a mod has never done, and FAR and NEAR do improved aerodynamics.

Maybe the secret feature is that they're making stock aero even worse? Extra thick and chunky soupmosphere...

Show me a hype train that can get into space and I'll buy my ticket today. Until then I'm leaving hype central station on my way to the hype plane hangar. But what I really want is a hype SPACESHIP!!

There's your darn space train!
You've made me a happy Kerbal. I'll take one ticket, please.

You've made me a happy Kerbal. I'll take one ticket, please.

Alright then. Welcome to the HypeTrain!

This time you seem to have enough boosters, so count me in

BYOB - Bring Your Own Boosters

HypeBus is back and better than ever. With new upgrades we have managed to squeeze in a third deck for three times the hype and three times the speed! why ride in a first class hypetrain when you can see the world going by at ten times the speed of hype from the third deck. For the same low price of 10 hype dollars* a ticket! come experience the hype of hypebus!**

* shipping and handling not included

** Hypebus incorperated is not responsible for death or injury due to hype overload

I voted plane because new plane parts. Gonna wave good by to the hyp train as the hypeplane makes it way to 0.25
Can't we just mix all the hype vehicles together. I will buy a ticket for the resulting vehicle.

I agree with worir4. One ticket to the resulting vehicle too.

Edited September 18, 2014 by Guest
The hype is real!
Guys I'm so hypeeeeeeddd and I'm burnt out on KSP and don't have anything else to play until the new update! Help me avoid this crisis!!11!! What should I do?!@?!

Guys I'm so hypeeeeeeddd and I'm burnt out on KSP and don't have anything else to play until the new update! Help me avoid this crisis!!11!! What should I do?!@?!

STOP PLAYING NOW. DO NOTHING KSP RELATED UNTIL .25 ARRIVES.

At the mention of QA i get all my guys home and stop playing till the update drops. Hit it fresh that way.

Edit: If you have no games, I can suggest Happy wheels, Toribash, No more room in hell, All of which are very fun, completely free to play, and not at all pay to win. otherwise get an old copy of elder scrolls: oblivion for cheap, so good.

The only real hyper way to travel is via the Hype rocket, otherwise known as a mainsail attatched to a mini fuel tank with the infinite fuel turned on...
